definition: gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots

sentences.english: After he pulled the trigger, the rifle kicked back and the hunter lost his balance.
sentences.chinese: 猎人扣动板机，猎枪的反冲力使他的身体失去了平衡。

sentences.english: The most surprising weapon was the double-barrel shotgun.
sentences.chinese: 最意想不到的武器是双筒猎枪。

sentences.english: Al alloy 3004 is chosen to manufacture shell cases of hunting rifles as a substitute of copper.
sentences.chinese: 为了节约铜材，选用了3004铝合金制造猎枪弹壳。

sentences.english: The Chief said once no one can stare down a shotgun .
sentences.chinese: 一旦没有人能注视下来一个散弹猎枪，领袖说。

sentences.english: It is hard to get ammunition, even the right shotgun.
sentences.chinese: 弹药很难获得，特别是双管猎枪。

sentences.english: End of mushroom when it was going to adopt home, a shotgun aimed at it.
sentences.chinese: 当它采完蘑菇正想回家时，一支猎枪瞄准了它。

sentences.english: I want to grab a shotgun and go all Cheney on them.
sentences.chinese: 我就想拿起猎枪，把所有子弹都射在它身上。

sentences.english: He was found by officers with his father's shotgun and cartridges。
sentences.chinese: 他被警察发现时身上带着他父亲的猎枪和子弹。

sentences.english: Several muzzles at once aimed at the fleeing birds in the air.
sentences.chinese: 好几支猎枪的枪口，同时瞄准了这些空中猎物。

sentences.english: One of them had a sawed-off shotgun right in the man's face.
sentences.chinese: 他们中的一个握着把猎枪对准这个男人的脸。

sentences.english: With great rage, the farmer reloads his shotgun and blows away the pigs.
sentences.chinese: 由于巨大的忿怒，农场主再装填他的猎枪并且开了枪。

sentences.english: I raised the shotgun and pulled the trigger.
sentences.chinese: 我拿起猎枪，扣动了扳机。

sentences.english: Kari's eyes strayed to a rack of shotguns on the wall nearby.
sentences.chinese: Kari被附近墙上的猎枪架分了神。

sentences.english: He took a pump-action shotgun and went to investigate.
sentences.chinese: 他抄起一杆猎枪去看个究竟。

sentences.english: A day, bunny meets by chance a hunter, by the head in hunt pop, blood is ejective.
sentences.chinese: 一天，兔子撞见猎人，被猎枪击中头颅，鲜血喷出。

definition: rifle (loanword)/also written 來復槍|来复枪
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots
